Title: Anla ordered a sanctioning process against Ecopetrol

Article: “Although the Company reported the contingency event that occurred on March 2, 2018 at the Palmas de Colombia property; According to the information provided in subsequent reports, it appears that the Company did not report on the occasion the real magnitude of the contingency that occurred and that it also reported as controlled on March 3, 2018, it hindered the monitoring activity by this Authority, preventing the exercise of the functions of visiting and monitoring the event in real time, since if the magnitude of the event was known at the time by the ANLA, technical personnel would have been immediately commissioned to the place of the event, with the purpose of taking security measures. prevention and control in accordance with the third article of resolution 1767 of November 2016,” expressed the order issued by the National Environmental Authority.
